text: The Return (the full name is The Return of the Darkness and Evil; sometimes called The Return......) is the second studio album released by the Swedish extreme metal Bathory. It was released on vinyl on 27 May 1985, through Combat Records. The album was very important in the death metal and black metal scene. == Songs == == People == * Quorthon – Guitars, Vocals, Additional Bass Guitar, Album Cover Design, album back and front cover photography, production, recording, mixing * Andreas Johansson – bass guitar, album back and front cover photography * Stefan Larsson – drums, album back and front cover photography * Gunnar Silins – album back and front cover photography == References == Category:1985 albums
title: The Return (Bathory album)
